      • isLeader

        public static boolean isLeader(java.util.UUID uuid,
               java.lang.String squadName)
        Checks if the specified player is the Leader of a specified squad
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of the player who might be the leader of the squad
        squadName - The name of the squad that the player might be the leader of
        Returns:
        true if the player is the leader, false if otherwise

      • isInSquad

        public static boolean isInSquad(java.util.UUID playerUUID,
                java.lang.String squadName)
        Checks if the specified player is in the specified squad
        Parameters:
        playerUUID - UUID for the player that you want to check if they are in the specified squad
        squadName - Name of the squad that may contain the Player
        Returns:
        true if they are in the specified squad, false otherwise

      • addMember

        public static void addMember(java.lang.String squadName,
             java.util.UUID memberUUID)
        Adds a member to a squad
        Parameters:
        squadName - The name of the squad that the player should be added to
        memberUUID - The UUID of the player that should be added to the squad

      • removeMember

        public static void removeMember(java.lang.String squadName,
                java.util.UUID memberUUID)
        Removes a member from a squad
        Parameters:
        squadName - The name of the squad that the player should removed from
        memberUUID - The UUID of the player that should be removed from the squad

      • getSquadForPlayer

        public static java.lang.String getSquadForPlayer(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Gets the squad that the player belongs to
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player that we want to get the squad for
        Returns:
        The squad's name, if they are not in a squad, this method will return "Not in Squad"

      • getLeader

        public static java.util.UUID getLeader(java.lang.String squad)
        Gets the leader for the specified squad
        Parameters:
        squad - The name of the squad that you want to get the leader of
        Returns:
        The UUID of the leader of that squad
